name: Cyber Truck Driver's Challenge
description:
Cyber Truck Driver's Challenge is a small demo of our racing/driving game tech and in keeping with the recent memes, the team programmer has done all the art.

WASD/Arrows to drive, space for handbrake, ESC to quit into the menu and R to restart current level. C to change camera.

Thank you for playing, if you enjoyed the aestethics and/or gameplay, feel free to follow our more serious projects using the various social medias provided on our itch page and website.
